::KitKat2::

"You just saw me go? I was at the Alliance base for days. And if I was
Alliance why would I fire deadly shots at the intruder?"
She thought about something she would know. 
"Along time ago I was forced to kill one of my friends, Time Bomb. And I
hope the Alliance doesn't know I'm going to marry DrillBit."
